comment: BREAKING - Looks like Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has had a long enough rest ( two weeks ) and is ready to rejoin us in Canada soon . He s expected to jump on a Challenger jet at today and we back around tonight .
amr:
# ::snt BREAKING - Looks like Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has had a long enough rest ( two weeks ) and is ready to rejoin us in Canada soon . He s expected to jump on a Challenger jet at today and we back around tonight .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / break-01
            :ARG1 (l / look-02
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (h / have-03
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Justin"
                                          :op2 "Truman")
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                                :mod (p2 / prime))))
                              :ARG1 (r / rest-01
                                    :ARG1 p
                                    :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                                          :ARG2 (l2 / long-03
                                                :ARG1 r)
                                          :ARG3 (e / enough))))
                        :op2 (r2 / ready-02
                              :ARG1 p
                              :ARG2 (r3 / rejoin-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (w / we)
                                    :location (c / country
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Canada"))
                                    :time (s / soon))))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (e2 / expect-01
                  :ARG1 (j / jump-03
                        :ARG0 (h4 / he)
                        :destination (j2 / jet
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Challenger"))
                        :time (t / today)))
            :op2 (b2 / back-02
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 h4
                        :op2 w)
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :dayperiod (n4 / night)
                        :mod t))))

comment: His presence means nothing . All thinking will be relegated to Butts and others . Obvious Trudeau incapable of anything but parroting , and usually does it badly . Worst , most divisive leader in Canadian history . Costa Rica can have him .
amr:
